Description: Adobe Muse CC 2015 - Visual Site Designer, operating on the principle of "display without saving changes in real time. " Thus, the developer is not required to open the HTML-code of the site - the edit panel allows you to work with the Web page as the image.
Obviously, this approach is aimed at creating a development environment available to users without special education. Adobe Muse CC 2015 uses the new Web standards, including HTML5 and CSS3 (with the support of these standards browsers), and combines the precision of design,
creative freedom and the ability to work with libraries and platforms with the addition of the navigation controls, widgets and HTML code to develop interactive website. Also, Adobe Muse CC 2015 allows you to make custom widgets, such as navigation menus, simple drag and drop elements.
Users can add fully customizable interactive elements including slideshows, tooltips, and complex effects of guidance (remote rollover). Even Adobe Muse CC 2015 allows you to embed HTML code fragments ready from various sources, including from Google Maps, YouTube and
In addition, Adobe Muse CC 2015 allows you to test sites stored on servers Adobe, for testing and evaluation. In the future, these sites can be sent to customers to transfer to a paid hosting servers Adobe, or export to the FTP site to other hosting providers.

Benefits Muse CC 2015
A compact screen. Great opportunities
Create unique versions of sites for desktops, tablet devices and smartphones. Work with text immediately in all products - edit the text once, and the changes take effect everywhere. Add slide shows and other elements that are optimized for the touch interface by dragging the desired gadget.
Customize icons for dial, map, or send e-mails. Spectacular effects. Without writing code Add scrolling effects to make your website more attractive and memorable. Bring the image and the elements in motion in different directions and at different speeds.
Apply transparency to add the effect of slow onset or disappearance to the text object or image. Apply effects to scroll through the slideshow and animations created in Adobe Edge, launched at the click of a mouse or touch screen on mobile devices.
Edit the existing sites in the browser Thanks to editing in the browser In-Browser Editing owners of existing sites may make minor changes to the site right in the browser, regardless of whether the provider hosting Adobe or other companies. You can then synchronize the updates from the source files Adobe Muse.
It is easy to start new projects use new resources Adobe Muse: mini-applications, files, necessary to get started, frames and design elements (buttons and icons) located in the community of designers, to get you started on a new project. To use any resource in your project,
just download it on the desktop and click on it - it will appear in the "LibraryÃ‚Â» Adobe Muse.
